author: Special Correspondent
text:
The boy was standing on the road side when the bus was turning

A four-year-old boy, P. Yogeswaran, died after being knocked down by a private school bus at Ammapatti near Thuraiyur on Tuesday. The accident occurred in the evening when the bus arrived at the designated spot to drop a group of children.

Police sources said that the boy came to the bus stop, located a few metres away from his house, to watch his elder sister Kavya, studying UKG in a private school, alight from the vehicle.

The sources said that Kavya along with a few other students alighted from the bus and then the driver moved the vehicle on the narrow stretch. The boy who was apparently standing on the roadside was knocked down by the rear side of the bus while.

He fell down and sustained severe head injury. Unaware that the vehicle had knocked down the boy, the driver drove the bus. The boy’s parents rushed him to a private hospital at Thuraiyur. He was later taken to a private hospital in Tiruchi where he was declared brought dead.

Thuraiyur police later arrested bus driver Paramasivam and booked a case.
title: Four-year-old boy knocked down by school bus
